/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. The buildings on either side of the street are painted in vibrant shades of red and green, adding a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image appears to have been taken during the day, as the sunlight filters through the leaves of the trees, casting dappled shadows on the street below.
